I am looking to sell this E-107 Type 1 Tully Sparks........However, I am looking to meet up with someone at the Philly Show this weekend for a cash sale.  

I am asking $600.00.  If someone is interested but unable to make the show, please let me know and maybe we can make other arrangements.

Thanks,
Bob
